get.description: A list of profiles defining the CoPP configuration.

post.summary: Create CoPP profile, which describes all CoPP policies configured on the switch

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

get.summary: Get CoPP profile, which describes all CoPP policies configured on the switch

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

delete.summary: Delete CoPP profile, which describes all CoPP policies configured on the switch

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

delete_object_type.name: object_type
delete_object_type.description: LOCAL - To delete local objects. SHARED - To delete shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

delete_scope_id.name: scope_id
delete_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

delete_persona.name: persona
delete_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_object_type.name: object_type
post_object_type.description: LOCAL - To create local objects. SHARED - To create shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

post_scope_id.name: scope_id
post_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_persona.name: persona
post_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_object_type.name: object_type
patch_object_type.description: LOCAL - To update local objects. SHARED - To update shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

patch_scope_id.name: scope_id
patch_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_persona.name: persona
patch_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

get_object_type.name: object_type
get_object_type.description: Retrieves LOCAL or SHARED or both(default) configuration objects.

get_scope_id.name: scope_id
get_scope_id.description: Configuration at a given scope. Mandatory for view_type = LOCAL.

get_persona.name: persona
get_persona.description: Filters configuration specific to given persona type. If not provided and view_type = LOCAL, then defaults to all persona.

effective.name: effective
effective.description: True - Returns effective configuration (i.e hierarchically merged configuration). False - Returns committed configuration at a given scope.

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: True - Includes annotations in the returned json to indicate the type of object, scope, and persona. False - Returns only config objects without annotations.

view_type.name: view_type
view_type.description: LIBRARY - Returns shared objects in library. For LIBRARY, all other parameters listed below, except 'detailed' , will be ignored. LOCAL - Returns configurations for a scope and one or more persona based on parameters below.

schema.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

schema.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

ArubaCopp_CoppSchema.description: A list of profiles defining the CoPP configuration.

name.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

ANY.description: Any of local or shared config object.

name.description: The name of the profile describing configured CoPP policies. (AOS-CX) Also the name of the CoPP policy as configured on the device.

user-defined-class-index.description: The index of the user-defined class. Can be 1-8.

x-enumDescriptions.IPV4: User defined class match IPv4 address
x-enumDescriptions.IPV6: User defined class match IPv6 address
x-enumDescriptions.IPV4_ANY: User defined class match any IPv4
x-enumDescriptions.IPV6_ANY: User defined class match any IPv6

oneOf.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

l4-port.x-typeDescription:
A 16-bit port number used by a transport protocol such as TCP
or UDP.

rate.description: Rate limit for an entry in the CoPP policy.

drop.description: Class is dropped in the CoPP policy.

x-enumDescriptions.ACL_LOGGING: CoPP policy entry for the ACL Logging class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 83260, 8400, 9300, 10000
x-enumDescriptions.ARP_BROADCAST: CoPP policy entry for the ARP Broadcast class.
x-enumDescriptions.ARP_PROTECT: CoPP policy entry for the ARP Protect class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6000, 6100, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360.
x-enumDescriptions.ARP_UNICAST: CoPP policy entry for the arp-unicast (AOS_CX) or station-arp (AOS_S) class.
x-enumDescriptions.BFD: CoPP policy entry for the BFD class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.BFD_CONTROL: CoPP policy entry for the BFD Control class. Supported platforms: 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360, 8400.
x-enumDescriptions.BGP: CoPP policy entry for the BGP class. Supported platforms: 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360.
x-enumDescriptions.BGP_IPV4: CoPP policy entry for the BGP IPv4 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.BGP_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the BGP IPv6 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.CAPTIVE_PORTAL: CoPP policy entry for the Captive Portal class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6000, 6100, 6200, 6300, 6400.
x-enumDescriptions.CLIENT_ONBOARD: CoPP policy entry for the Client Onboard class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400.
x-enumDescriptions.DFP_COLLECTOR: CoPP policy entry for the DFP Collector class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400.
x-enumDescriptions.DHCP: CoPP policy entry for the DHCP class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6000, 6100, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360, 8400.
x-enumDescriptions.DHCP_IPV4: CoPP policy entry for the DHCP IPv4 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.DHCP_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the DHCP IPv6 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.DSS: CoPP policy entry for the DSS class. Supported platforms: 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.ERPS: CoPP policy entry for the ERPS class. Supported platforms: 4100, 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.FIB_OPTIMIZATION: CoPP policy entry for the FIB Optimization class. Supported platforms: 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360.
x-enumDescriptions.FLOW_TELEMETRY: CoPP policy entry for the Flow Telemetry class. Supported platforms: 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.HYPERTEXT: CoPP policy entry for the Hypertext class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.ICMP_SECURITY_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the ICMP Security IPv6 class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360.
x-enumDescriptions.ICMP_UNICAST: CoPP policy entry for icmp-unicast (AOS_CX) or station-icmp (AOS_S)
x-enumDescriptions.IEEE_8021X: CoPP policy entry for the IEEE 802.1x class. Supported plaforms: 4100, 5420, 6000, 6100, 6200, 5300, 6400, 8100, 8325, 8360, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.IP_EXCEPTIONS: CoPP policy entry for the IP Exceptions class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.IPFIX: CoPP policy entry for the IPFix class. Supported platforms: 6300, 6400, 8100, 8325, 8360.
x-enumDescriptions.IP_LOCKDOWN: CoPP policy entry for the IP Lockdown class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8325, 8360, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.IPSEC: CoPP policy entry for the IPSec class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.IP_TRACKER: CoPP policy entry for the IP Tracker class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400.
x-enumDescriptions.IP_UNICAST: CoPP policy entry for ip-unicast (AOS_CX) or station-ip (AOS_S)
x-enumDescriptions.IPV4_OPTIONS: CoPP policy entry for the IPv4 Options class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 8400, 9300, 10000.

x-enumDescriptions.LACP: CoPP policy entry for the LACP class.
x-enumDescriptions.LAYER2_CONTROL: CoPP policy entry for the layer2-control class.
x-enumDescriptions.LOOP_PROTECT: CoPP policy entry for the loop-protect (AOS_CX) or loop-ctrl-loop-protect (AOS_S) class.

x-enumDescriptions.OSPF_MULTICAST_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the OSPF Multicast IPv6 class.
x-enumDescriptions.OSPF_UNICAST: CoPP policy entry for the OSPF unicast class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360, 8400.

x-enumDescriptions.OSPF_UNICAST_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the OSPF Unicast IPv6 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.PIM: CoPP policy entry for the PIM class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.PTP: CoPP policy entry for the PTP class. Supported platforms: 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360, 9300.
x-enumDescriptions.PVST: CoPP policy entry for pvst (AOS_CX) or loop-ctrl-pvst (AOS_S)
x-enumDescriptions.SECURE_LEARN: CoPP policy entry for the Secure Learn class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8325, 8360, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.SFLOW: CoPP policy entry for the Sflow (AOS_CX) or sampling (AOS_S) class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.SMARTLINK: CoPP policy entry for the Smartlink (AOS_CX) or loop-ctrl-smart-links (AOS_S) class. Supported platforms: 4100, 6000, 6100.
x-enumDescriptions.SSH: CoPP policy entry for the SSH class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.TELNET: CoPP policy entry for the Telnet class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.UDLD: CoPP policy entry for the udld (AOS_CX) or udld-control (AOS_S) class
x-enumDescriptions.UNKNOWN_MULTICAST: CoPP policy entry for the Unknown Multicast class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8320, 8325, 8360, 8400, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.VRRP: CoPP policy entry for the VRRP (AOS_CX) or ip-gateway-control (AOS_S) class. Supported platforms: 5420, 6200, 6300, 6400, 8100, 8360, 8400.
x-enumDescriptions.VRRP_IPV4: CoPP policy entry for the VRRP IPv4 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.VRRP_IPV6: CoPP policy entry for the VRRP IPv6 class. Supported platforms: 8320, 8325, 9300, 10000.
x-enumDescriptions.DEFAULT_CLASS: CoPP policy entry for default-class (AOS_CX) or unclassified (AOS_S) class.

class.description: The name of the CoPP class

rate-kbits.description: Rate limit for an entry in the CoPP policy, in kilobits per second (kbps). Supported platforms: 8400, 9300. Min: 1; Max: 999999

burst-kbytes.description: Burst limit for an entry in the CoPP policy, in kilobytes (kB). Supported platforms: 8400, 9300. Min: 1; Max: 130

drop.description: Sets packets for the given class to be dropped. Standalone parameter - cannot be set to true if any of priority/rate/burst are set.

configured-copp-policy-entries.description: List of configured policy entries. (AOS-CX) The default class must be configured.

user-defined-class-entries.description: List of the user defined classes. PVOS only.

applied.description: Whether or not this is the applied CoPP policy

Successful200.description: Success response returned from the server.

Error400.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Bad request. Invalid values supplied in request.

Error401.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error403.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error404.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Not found. Yang / Corresponding Rule is missing.

Error406.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error408.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error412.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error429.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error500.description: Error details returned from the server.
